Title: The Vinki
Description:
[b]Play as an angsty teen wearing rail-grinding shoes and spraying graffiti to enact revenge on 5P.[/b]

[h2]We are also looking for [b]playtesters[/b] for unreleased versions of the mod, and [b]graffiti submissions[/b] too! If you're interested in either of these or just want to get the latest scoops on the mod's progress, join [url=https://discord.gg/hqpBUTrNzh] this Discord server[/url]![/h2]

[h1][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3009407468]GUIDE ON CONTROLS + HOW TO INSERT CUSTOM IMAGES![/url][/h1]
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3009407468

[h2][url=https://github.com/OlayColay/TheVinki/releases]Manual Installation[/url][/h2]
https://github.com/OlayColay/TheVinki/releases

[h2]Note that Improved Input Config is not a hard dependency, but it is the only way to change Vinki's controls (defaults are in the guide)[/h2]

[img]https://i.imgur.com/9EviGd5.gif[/img]

[img]https://i.imgur.com/fOCUaI1.gif[/img]

[img]https://i.imgur.com/dwGJtYC.gif[/img]

[h1]Story[/h1]
Join Vinki in a quest to paint the town red! More to come soon!

[b][url=https://artfight.net/character/3448140.the-vinki-slugcat]Artfight link
[img]https://i.imgur.com/2xdHjcJ.png[/img][/url][/b]

[/list]

[h1]Known Mod Conflicts[/h1]
[list]
[*][strike][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2957745837]What's In My Pocket[/url][/strike] (should be fixed now)
[*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3035427908]Cosmospectre[/url]
[*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=3089929720]Deserted Wastelands[/url] (causes tutorial music to not trigger)
[*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2979857064]Deadlands[/url] (for easter egg reasons)
[*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3046862358]Dessication[/url] (breaks initial cutscene, but should be fine after the first cycle)
[*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2990306192&searchtext=witness]Nyctophobia[/url] (breaks initial cutscene, but should be fine after the first cycle)
[/list]

Let me know if you have any questions or suggestions! You can also find me on Discord at [i]olaycolay[/i]
